resources.string: The name must not be empty

Before you can use this application, you have to create a profile. To do so, you have to push ADD NEW PROFILE, type in your name and a description for the profile.

 Name: “Max Mustermann”
 Description: “Business”

 Next step is to click on the SAVE button and your profile will be created.

 If you want to cancel the process, press CANCEL on the bottom of the “Add new profile” dialogue.

 You can always change the Profile or delete it by holding on it and either using the trash can to delete it or the pencil to change it.

 You can create as many profiles as you want.

This is the main menu. Here you can navigate to the different activities.

 Choose an action by just pushing on one of the buttons below.

 These buttons will lead you to the submenus where you will find further information.

The purpose of groups is to sort your transactions logically and sum them up.
 This makes the analysis of you data more easy an you can gather an optimal view on the result.

 There are some given groups which you can extend or change to adapt them to your personal preferences. You can also add new groups.

 To create a new group you have to push ADD A NEW GROUP, type in a name and a description for the group.

 Name: “Sparetime”
 Description: “Sparetime expenditure”

 Next step is to click on the SAVE button and your group will be created.

 If you want to cancel the process, press CANCEL on the bottom of the “Add a new group” dialogue.

 You can always change the Profile or delete it by holding on it and either using the trash can to delete it or the pencil to change it.

The purpose of transactions it to book new expenditures or revenues and to make them available for the analysis.

 To create a new transaction you have to push ADD A NEW TRANSACTION, type in a name, a description and an amount for the transaction.

 Name: “Income”
 Description: “Work”
 Amount: “3000”

 After that, just follow the given choices and decide if it is an expenditure or revenue and choose if it is a single transaction or if it is a recurrent transaction.

 Next step is to click on the SAVE button and your transaction will be created.

 If you want to cancel the process, press CANCEL on the bottom of the “Add a new transaction” dialogue.

 You can always change the transaction or delete it by holding on it and either using the trash can to delete it or the pencil to change it.
